page.title: 02TEMPLE GUITING SCHOOL
page.content: The school was begun in 1870 and opened on{January 6th, 1873, } following Forster's Education Act of 1870. The windows were built high off the ground so that the children were not distracted from their work. The first Headteacher was{Miss Mary Drury followed by{Mr.Edward Phillips. Mr. {Rushin,}the present Headteacher, is the 16th since the school began and came in 1980. Today there are{36 children in the school,{22 juniors and {14 infants. 24}are {boys}and {12 {girls.}We do Ginn and Fletcher Maths, Creative Writing and other English work,Science, History,Art and Craft, Music and P.E. and Games. We have a goldfish called either Jaws or Bob who is about 14 years old. It is a brilliant school.
